name: admin-panel-service
description: - Store (tenant) creation & onboarding - Subdomain or custom domain management - Theme & feature selection - Creates and manages tenant-specific DB connections

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-contents
scripts.migrate-generate: tsc && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name user --attributes email:string,password:string --migrations-path src/migrations --config dist/config/config.js
scripts.migrate-run: tsc && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config dist/config/config.js --migrations-path src/migrations
scripts.seeder-all: tsc && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config dist/config/config.js --seeders-path dist/seeders
scripts.seeder-undo: tsc && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --config dist/config/config.js --seeders-path dist/seeders
